tns:patch.keyword: Move FM editable exports to modules
tns:patch.author: vchihai
tns:patch.description: Activity editable exports in public view

script.lang: INSERT INTO amp_modules_visibility (id, name, haslevel, parent) SELECT (select nextval('amp_modules_visibility_seq')), 'Sector Mapping', true, (SELECT id FROM amp_modules_visibility WHERE name = 'ADMINISTRATIVE SECTION') WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT id FROM amp_modules_visibility WHERE name = 'Sector Mapping');
